title: Haney: Nuclear Triad Remains Necessary for Deterrence (US Department of Defense)
text: ( Source : US Department of Defense ) WASHINGTON, October 23 , 2015 - Navy Adm. Cecil D. Haney doesn't deal in sound bites or bumper sticker sayings or elevator speeches, nor should he. The world is a complex place, and as the commander of U.S.
